name: Soul Ring
description: A ring that resonates with the soul. Boosts all cursed energy output significantly. Crafted from the remnants of a high-grade cursed spirit.
howToObtain: Defeat the Final Boss in Nightmare Mode

name: Molten Ring
description: A ring forged in the heart of a volcano. Burns enemies on contact and enhances fire-based techniques.
howToObtain: Complete the Volcano Raid with S-Rank

name: Jade Wrist Beads
description: Beads that calm the spirit and focus energy. Used by monks for centuries to enhance meditation and cursed energy control.

name: Ninja Headband
description: Increases agility and movement speed. Worn by stealth specialists who favor hit-and-run tactics.

name: Tactful Ring
description: A simple ring that enhances technique precision. Favored by sorcerers who prioritize accuracy over raw power.

name: Silver Ring
description: Standard silver ring possessed by many sorcerers. A basic accessory that provides modest CE enhancement.

name: Cursed Amulet
description: An amulet infused with residual cursed energy from ancient battles. Passively absorbs curse energy from defeated enemies.
howToObtain: Find in the Cursed Tomb Dungeon (3% drop rate)

name: Swift Tabi Boots
description: Traditional Japanese split-toe boots enhanced with cursed energy. Allows for rapid movement and silent approaches.

name: Barrier Protection Charm
description: A protective talisman blessed by a high-grade sorcerer. Creates a temporary barrier when taking fatal damage.
howToObtain: Complete the 'Protecting the Weak' S-Rank Mission

name: Concentration Headband
description: Worn by students at Jujutsu High during training. Helps maintain focus during extended battles.

name: Berserker's Ring
description: A dangerous ring that amplifies aggressive tendencies. Increases damage but reduces defense.

name: Six Eyes Blindfold
description: A sacred blindfold that limits overwhelming visual input. Reserved for those with the Six Eyes technique. Reduces CE consumption significantly.
howToObtain: Unlock Limitless Clan with Six Eyes passive

name: Sukuna Finger Ring
description: A ring crafted to hold a fragment of Sukuna's power. Grants immense strength but corrupts the user over time.
howToObtain: Collect all 20 Sukuna Fingers in Story Mode

name: Ten Shadows Cloak
description: A cloak woven from shadow essence. Allows partial concealment in darkness and enhances shadow-based techniques.

name: Blood Vial Pendant
description: A pendant containing preserved Kamo clan blood. Enhances blood manipulation techniques and provides emergency HP recovery.
howToObtain: Reach Master rank with Blood Manipulation Clan

name: Curse Absorbing Gloves
description: Reinforced gloves that absorb residual cursed energy on contact. Essential gear for close-combat sorcerers.

name: Jujutsu High Badge
description: Official badge of Tokyo Jujutsu High. Shows your affiliation and grants access to school facilities.

name: Domain Amplifier
description: A rare artifact that amplifies domain expansion power. Only the strongest sorcerers can harness its full potential.

name: Heavenly Restriction Chain
description: A chain that binds cursed energy in exchange for physical prowess. Used by those with Heavenly Restriction.
howToObtain: Choose Heavenly Restriction path at character creation

name: Reverse Cursed Bracelet
description: A bracelet infused with reverse cursed technique energy. Provides passive healing over time.

name: Black Flash Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets designed to channel the power of Black Flash. Increases critical hit damage significantly.

name: Cursed Speech Mask
description: A mask that amplifies vocal cursed energy. Reduces the backlash from using Cursed Speech commands.

name: Gambler's Dice Earring
description: Lucky dice earrings favored by Hakari. Increases luck-based effects and jackpot chances.

name: Iron Will Belt
description: A reinforced belt that stabilizes the body during intense combat. Reduces stagger and knockback effects.

name: Best Friend Band
description: A bracelet symbolizing true friendship. Boosts stats when fighting alongside allies. Todo would approve.

name: 7:3 Precision Watch
description: Nanami's signature watch. Helps identify weak points and increases critical hit accuracy.

name: CE Detector Lens
description: Special lenses that visualize cursed energy flow. Helps identify hidden enemies and traps.

name: Binding Vow Seal
description: A powerful seal used to create binding vows. Allows trading one stat for another at enhanced rates.
howToObtain: Learn about Binding Vows from Gojo NPC

name: Cursed Tool Storage Bag
description: A bag with expanded interior space using cursed energy. Increases inventory capacity significantly.

name: Soul Resonance Earring
description: An earring that vibrates with soul energy. Increases soul-based technique effectiveness.

name: Cursed Training Weights
description: Heavy weights infused with cursed energy. Slow movement but increase strength gains.

name: Resonance Hairpin
description: Nobara's iconic hairpin. Enhances Straw Doll techniques and allows for precise curse manipulation.
